ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] New member here
ygData.msgSnippet: If you just HAVE to have a fix, they are offering 30 days free.  Can t use your old account of course, but you could make a new toon and check things out until
ygData.messageBody:
If you just HAVE to have a fix, they are offering 30 days free. Can't use
your old account of course, but you could make a new toon and check things
out until you have the $$ to get signed back up.
http://eqlive.station.sony.com/

As for what has gone on since April, I am not sure. I got back in myself a
little while ago. You can make all traders in Bazaar invisible to help with
lag, not sure when that came out. The link above will take you to the
official site and there you can read the latest updates.


> -----Original Message-----
> From: dirtyolbum4fun [mailto:dirtyolbum4fun@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, September 01, 2004 11:34 AM
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [EverQuest] New member here
>
>
> First off i wanna say hello to everyone, second i just want to take
> a minute and say EQ rocks. I'm currently going through eq withdrawls
> at the moment due to a financial hardship but with luck i plan on
> getting back to the game in about a week. i havnt played since about
> april, so if anyone can tell me about any changes in the game since
> then id be really cool. thanks
